javadoc: Interface used to track the state of a GTaskManager

methods.javadoc:
Called when a task listener is added so that the listener can get all the initial state of
 the taskManger while the taskManager is in a locked state where nothing will change.
methods.name: initialize
methods.comment:
Called when a task listener is added so that the listener can get all the initial state of
 the taskManger while the taskManager is in a locked state where nothing will change.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that a task is starting to run
@param task the GTask that is starting to run
methods.name: taskStarted
methods.comment: Notification that a task is starting to run

params.name: task
params.comment: the GTask that is starting to run

methods.name: taskCompleted
methods.comment:
Notification that a task is no longer running regardless of whether it completed normally,
 was cancelled, or threw an unhandled exception.

params.name: result
params.comment: the result state for the task.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that a GTaskGroup has been scheduled.
@param group the GTaskGroup that has been scheduled to run.
methods.name: taskGroupScheduled
methods.comment: Notification that a GTaskGroup has been scheduled.

params.name: group
params.comment: the GTaskGroup that has been scheduled to run.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that a new GTask has been scheduled to run.
@param scheduledTask the GScheduledTask that wraps the GTask with scheduling information.
methods.name: taskScheduled
methods.comment: Notification that a new GTask has been scheduled to run.

params.name: scheduledTask
params.comment: the GScheduledTask that wraps the GTask with scheduling information.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that a new GTaskGroup has started to run.
@param taskGroup the new GTaskGroup that is running.
methods.name: taskGroupStarted
methods.comment: Notification that a new GTaskGroup has started to run.

params.name: taskGroup
params.comment: the new GTaskGroup that is running.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that the GTaskGroup has completed running.
@param taskGroup the GTaskGroup that has completed running.
methods.name: taskGroupCompleted
methods.comment: Notification that the GTaskGroup has completed running.

params.name: taskGroup
params.comment: the GTaskGroup that has completed running.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that the GTaskManager has been suspended or resumed.
@param suspended true if the GTaskManger has been suspended, or false if it has been resumed.
methods.name: suspendedStateChanged
methods.comment: Notification that the GTaskManager has been suspended or resumed.

params.name: suspended
params.comment: true if the GTaskManger has been suspended, or false if it has been resumed.

name: GTaskListener
comment: Interface used to track the state of a GTaskManager
